post:
Howdy HostBalls friends!

I am hoping 2020 will be a great year for all of us. SmallWeb has brand new reseller plans available, the latter two come with Free monthly Blesta licensing and a free .COM for 1 year.

I’ve also simplified the 2 & 5GB (Previously 4) to be priced yearly at £10 and £20.

Los Angeles, US | New York, US | Luxembourg, EU | Amsterdam, EU | London, UK | Melbourne, AU

SmallWeb Hosting Features:

  • Latest DirectAdmin
  • SSD or NVMe Storage
  • Free Let’s Encrypt SSL
  • Free Daily Backups
  • CloudLinux LVE
  • Multi PHP Selector
  • MariaDB SQL
  • IPv6 Supported
  • UK Based Support
  • ClamAV Virus Scanner
  • SpamAssasin Filters
  • Unlimited Email Accounts
  • Unlimited SQL Databases
  • Free Softaculous Apps
  • Dedicated IP for £2/mo
